column5: I should probably be working but...  Anyway, I saw this on the internet (searching google images) and came across this... Thought it was interesting  enough to share with everyone...  http://worldvisionportal.org/lln/?attachment_id=98
Yep.  You probably should be working.  This article has already made the rounds.
It's not really a double mouth IMHO, looks like damage to the fishes tongue when it was younger and healed misshapen.
He eats out of both mouths. This way it takes half the time to eat so he has more time to drink beer and watch sports.
I caught one in the Credit Riover a few years ago. Total freak. Two jaws and the body of a Brown Trout?
